item.title: Existing-home sales rise in October but are expected to remain sluggish for the time being
item.description: Existing-home sales rose to a rate of 3.96 million in October, the National Association of Realtors said.

item.title: Alphabet’s stock slides as Feds push for Chrome sale. Why fears are overblown.
item.description: The Google parent’s stock is heading for its worst day in 10 months. But one analyst thinks a forced Chrome sale seems unlikely.
